sources.title: Kill or Be Killed
sources.description: Title: Kill or Be Killed Summary: Man accused of a murder he didn't commit hides out in the South American jungle. Directed by: Max Nosseck Actors: Lawrence Tierney, George Coulouris, Marissa O Production Company: Juno Productions Inc. Release Date: April 1950 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Man accused of a murder he didn't commit hides out in the South American jungle.

metadata.Plot: A man falsely accused of murder hides out in the South American jungle.
metadata.Writer: Arnold Lipp, Max Nosseck, Lawrence L. Goldman
metadata.Actors: Lawrence Tierney, George Coulouris, Marissa O'Brien
